title: Comparative design review: an exercise in parallel design
proctitle: CHI '93: Proceedings of the INTERACT '93 and CHI '93 Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems
abstract: Three user interface designers were asked to design interfaces for a given problem. These designs were made available to a group of usability specialists for heuristic evaluation. The reviewers will lead off the panel with specific questions to the designers regarding the usability aspects of their designs. The panel will feature a lively discussion of the designers' various approaches and solutions.

references.text: Nielsen, J. Usability Engineering, Academic Press, San Diego, CA, 1993.
